alert.note: Alert for Surry; Yadkin (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 11:57AM EST until January 10 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Blacksburg VA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in North Carolina... Yadkin River At Elkin affecting Surry and Yadkin Counties. For the Yadkin River...including Elkin...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Yadkin River at Elkin. * WHEN...From this evening to early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 18.5 feet, Rockford Road near Rockford floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 5.6 feet. - Bankfull stage is 16.0 feet. - Forecast...The Yadkin River at Elkin is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 18.8 feet. It will then fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - For flooding safety information, please visit http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. The next statement will be issued late tonight at midnight EST.
